page.title: 05RURAL FAMILY LIFE.
page.content: Of the total permenant population of 58, 43 are based at home during the day, therefore in many households the entire family dine together 3 times daily far greater emphasis on family life than in urban ares. Weekly home baking is still completed in 90% of households this includes the making of bread, pastry,cakes,biscuits and a far wider use of traditional and health foods than the use of mixes and preprepared frozen/tinned foods. Cooking is by electricity or solid fuel,popular dishes_ Bacon & Egg to start the day Roast Beef & Yorkshire Pudding eaten in many households once a week. Apple Pie with Custard favourite pud Chocolate Cake & homemade gingersnap In every home always a welcome cup of tea or coffee to greet the visiter.
